item.name: corrupt-packets
item.description: Number of corrupt packets received

item.name: deferred-cache-inserts
item.description: Number of cache inserts that were deferred because of maintenance.

item.name: deferred-cache-lookup
item.description: Number of cache lookups that were deferred because of maintenance.

item.name: dnsupdate-changes
item.description: Total number of changes to records from DNS update.

item.name: dnsupdate-answers
item.description: Number of DNS update packets successfully answered.

item.name: dnsupdate-queries
item.description: Number of DNS update packets received.

item.name: dnsupdate-refused
item.description: Number of DNS update packets that were refused.

item.name: key-cache-size
item.description: Number of entries in the key cache.

item.name: latency
item.description: Average number of microseconds a packet spends within PowerDNS.

item.name: meta-cache-size
item.description: Number of entries in the metadata cache.

item.name: packetcache-hit
item.description: Number of packets which were answered out of the cache.

item.name: packetcache-miss
item.description: Number of times a packet could not be answered out of the cache.

item.name: packetcache-size
item.description: Amount of packets in the packetcache.

item.name: qsize-q
item.description: Number of packets waiting for database attention.

item.name: qtype-a
item.description: queries of given type per second

item.name: qtype-aaaa
item.description: queries of given type per second

item.name: qtype-any
item.description: queries of given type per second

item.name: qtype-caa
item.description: queries of given type per second

item.name: qtype-cname
item.description: queries of given type per second

item.name: qtype-dnskey
item.description: queries of given type per second

item.name: qtype-https
item.description: queries of given type per second

item.name: qtype-mx
item.description: queries of given type per second

item.name: qtype-ns
item.description: queries of given type per second

item.name: qtype-soa
item.description: queries of given type per second

item.name: qtype-spf
item.description: queries of given type per second

item.name: qtype-srv
item.description: queries of given type per second

item.name: qtype-txt
item.description: queries of given type per second

item.name: query-cache-hit
item.description: Number of hits on the query cache.

item.name: query-cache-miss
item.description: Number of misses on the query cache.

item.name: rd-queries
item.description: Number of packets sent by clients requesting recursion (regardless of if we'll be providing them with recursion).

item.name: recursing-answers
item.description: Number of packets we supplied an answer to after recursive processing.

item.name: recursing-questions
item.description: Number of packets we performed recursive processing for.

item.name: recursion-unanswered
item.description: Number of packets we sent to our recursor, but did not get a timely answer for.

item.name: security-status
item.description:
Security status based on security polling. https://doc.powerdns.com/md/common/security/#security-polling
0: NXDOMAIN or resolution failure 1: OK 2: Upgrade recommended for security reasons 3: Upgrade mandatory for security reasons

item.name: servfail-packets
item.description: Amount of packets that could not be answered due to database problems.

item.name: signatures
item.description: Number of DNSSEC signatures created.

item.name: signature-cache-size
item.description: Number of entries in the signature cache.

item.name: sys-msec
item.description: Number of CPU milliseconds spent in 'system' mode.

item.name: tcp-answers
item.description: Number of answers sent out over TCP.

item.name: tcp-queries
item.description: Number of questions received over TCP.

item.name: timedout-packets
item.description: Amount of packets that were dropped because they had to wait too long internally.

item.name: timedout-questions
item.description: Amount of questions that were dropped because they had to wait too long internally.

item.name: udp4-answers
item.description: Number of answers sent out over UDPv4.

item.name: udp4-queries
item.description: Number of questions received over UDPv4.

item.name: udp6-answers
item.description: Number of answers sent out over UDPv6.

item.name: udp6-queries
item.description: Number of questions received over UDPv6.

item.name: udp-answers
item.description: Number of answers sent out over UDP.

item.name: udp-answers-bytes
item.description: Total number of answer bytes sent over UDP.

item.name: udp-do-queries
item.description: Number of queries received with the DO (DNSSEC OK) bit set.

item.name: udp-queries
item.description: Number of questions received over UDP.

item.name: uptime
item.description: Uptime in seconds of the daemon.

item.name: user-msec
item.description: Number of CPU milliseconds spent in 'user' mode.
